Class MoteTracker

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      MoteTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, net.tinyos.message.MessageListener
public class MoteTracker
extends java.lang.Thread
implements net.tinyos.message.MessageListener

This class keeps tracks of the mote attached to the minor node and update their status in the database.
